title: Merge pull request #105 from LukeOwncloud/master
message:
Merge pull request #105 from LukeOwncloud/master

Make sure #anchor is observed by WebView sitemap elements.

title: Make sure #anchor is observed by WebView elements.
message:
Make sure #anchor is observed by WebView elements.
Currently when speficying an openHAB WebView sitemap element pointing to
www.url.com/site.html#bottom the anchor (#bottom) is ignored.

Note: This PR might now be necessary. Currently the #anchor (aka
fragment) is not send by openHAB core. This should be fixed by
https://github.com/openhab/openhab/pull/2623
Once that PR is accepted, test whether this PR is required and has
desired effect.

Depends on https://github.com/openhab/openhab/pull/2623

message:
versionName->1.6.0.1
Added a workaround for https://github.com/openhab/openhab.android/issues/16 - sometimes while resuming from background, state fragment exists but has 0 fragments inside, which makes the app stale. This workaround detects 0 fragments restored and restarts the whole app process

title: This is a major change to the app directory structure.
message:
This is a major change to the app directory structure.
App is now migrated to the default directory structure of an Android Studio project which
includes modules for mobile app itself and it's wear companion app though no wear app yet
is introduced.
Build system is changed to gradle, CI will be reconfigured soon, untill then android builds
will not be available on CI.
Updated dependancies to later versions.

title: Fix chart with multiple persistence services.
message:
Fix chart with multiple persistence services.

The sitemap element charts has an optional parameter service, that sets
the persistence service to use.
This parameter must also be used if the chart is requested from the openHAB
server.

Improved stability

title: Styling for both light and dark themes (app icon)
message:
Styling for both light and dark themes (app icon)
Fixed startup/restore sequence of main activity
Class cleanup

title: Fixed command sending with AsyncHttpClient
message:
Fixed command sending with AsyncHttpClient
Some more styling for widgets list

title: Switched to openhab modified version of AsyncHttpClient which is adopted for…
message:
Switched to openhab modified version of AsyncHttpClient which is adopted for long-polling requests processing to optimize network traffic
Restyling of widget list
This is an interim version, NFC is non functional!

title: 24h stability test with long-polling passed.
message:
24h stability test with long-polling passed.
Moved command sending to volley.
Added network changes tracker to openHAB tracker.
Fixed some minor bugs.

title: Fixed sitemap new volley based page poll cycle in OpenHABWidgetFragment, it is now stable
message:
Fixed sitemap new volley based page poll cycle in OpenHABWidgetFragment, it is now stable
Fixed an issue with page title when it was not set for the first ever opened page, currupted by invisible pages from backstack and raw label value (with []) was set for certain pages.
Fixed mic icon to be lighter or darker depending on selected theme
HABDroid themes are now custom, extended from Android Holo themes, so it will be easier to customize L&F in the future
Disabled swipe in view pager to retain previous user experience
Fixed DocumentRequest to set Accepted header to application/xml.

title: Huge refactoring.
message:
Huge refactoring.
Sitemap browsing switched to fragments (OpenHABWidgetListFragment and OpenHABFragmentPagerAdaper + OpenHABViewPager)
Main activity is now OpenHABMainActivity
Discovery process is moved into separate class - OpenHABTracker
A lot of things moved to Util
Huge change - HTTP processing is moving to Volley - a new Google framework
This version has non-functional NFC support (not ported to new structure of application yet)

title: Added (yet hidden) voice recognition icon to action bar
message:
Added (yet hidden) voice recognition icon to action bar
Added a neat feature to pre-set title of new sitemap page when opening it, so now a new title is displayed immideately instead of 'openHAB' which used to be displayed until the page load completes.

General code cleanup

title: Version 1.2.0.14
message:
Version 1.2.0.14
Major change for supporting animated transition between sitemap changes. Drill down navigation through sitemap now creates new instance of the same activity
Transition animations between activities style is now a setting (Android, iOS, none)
Fixed a bug when no wifi multicast lock permission caused a crash. Now it causes disabling openHAB discovery with a warning message to user.
Fixed a bug where item value caused exception in selection widget

title: Changed navigation model to launching a new activity for drill-down through…

Added sliding animations for activities and widget list

title: Version 1.2.0.12
message:
Version 1.2.0.12
Added support for Colorpicker widget in NFC. There is now possibility to select On, Off, Toggle and Current Color action.
Fixed some bugs.

title: Fixed an issue with widget list position while navigating through pages. Now new…
message: Fixed an issue with widget list position while navigating through pages. Now new page is always started at position = 0 while position in previous pages is stored in page stack and is restored when user returns to previous page with 'back' button.

title: - Added video widget support
message:
- Added video widget support

title: - Added chart widget support
message:
- Added chart widget support
- Fixed image widget formatting

title: - Fixed an issue with manually configured openHAB url which just was not used by…
message:
- Fixed an issue with manually configured openHAB url which just was not used by HABDroid. Now if it is configured, no discovery is performed
- Default alternative openHAB url is set to demo server on the internet
- Added functionality to select sitemap from the list of available sitemaps during first run and through application 'menu'. When sitemap is selected it is then used when HABDroid launches as a preffered one
- Fixed startup sequence which was broken in case of no openHAB uuid was stored yet (application just stopped working)
- Removed openHAB name from settings as it is useless

title: - Fixed a bug which occured with previous fix of Switch slide and leaded to…
message:
- Fixed a bug which occured with previous fix of Switch slide and leaded to weird switches behaviour. Switch actions are now based on onTouch handler and fire after the touch event is released (UP).
- Fixed a reported bug with ImageButtons used in rollershutter which leaded to unstable button presses in some cases (shaking hands :-). ImageButton is also based on onTouch handler now.

title: - Workaround for IPv6 problems. jmDNS now only uses IPv4. This will be fixed later.
message:
- Workaround for IPv6 problems. jmDNS now only uses IPv4. This will be fixed later.
- Fixed a bug with a Switch which didn't react on sliding. Changed event handling from onClick to onCheckedChanged.

title: Updated rollershutter up&down button icons and made app icon without arrows on top of app.
message: Updated rollershutter up&down button icons and made app icon without arrows on top of app.

message: Added icons to Rollershutter buttons (finally :-)

title: Fixed an issue when Section switch label holds some value in brakets. It's now…
message: Fixed an issue when Section switch label holds some value in brakets. It's now shown on the right side, aligned to the left from the switch, separately from the label.

title: A lot of design tuning for widgets list view. Dividers are now included into…
message: A lot of design tuning for widgets list view. Dividers are now included into widgets (ListView dividers disabled) and fully controlled by the app.

title: Fixed a bug when group widgets were showing cached value label on right side…
message: Fixed a bug when group widgets were showing cached value label on right side even for groups with no values.

UI Changes:

- moved value labels to the right side of widgets instead of second line
- fixed page title when going into group (just showing the name of group without value)
- fixed group widget to get value and show it on the right side
